projects.title: All Things Bright and Beautiful
projects.shortDescription: Published book available on Lulu. A collection exploring themes of wonder and beauty in everyday life.
projects.detailedDescription: A contemplative collection of interconnected stories that find the extraordinary in ordinary moments. From a child's discovery of fireflies to an elderly woman's garden ritual, these tales weave together themes of memory, hope, and the quiet magic that surrounds us daily.
projects.excerpt: The morning light caught the spider's web like a net for dreams. Sarah pressed her nose against the kitchen window, watching dewdrops transform into tiny prisms. She was seven, and the world was still full of small miracles waiting to be noticed.

reviews.quote: Miller captures the profound in the mundane with remarkable sensitivity.

projects.title: My Balloons
projects.shortDescription: A whimsical story published on Lulu, capturing moments of joy and letting go.
projects.detailedDescription: A gentle children's story about Emma, who receives a handful of colorful balloons on her birthday. As the day unfolds, she learns about sharing, loss, and the beautiful impermanence of special moments. Each balloon represents a different emotion and teaches a small lesson about growing up.
projects.excerpt: Emma held five balloons: red like her favorite apple, blue like the summer sky, yellow like sunshine, green like grass, and purple like her grandmother's favorite flowers.
projects.collaborativeNote: Illustrated by Juleah Miller, combining Alek's storytelling with Juleah's visual artistry.

projects.title: Desert Roads
projects.shortDescription: A novel in progress exploring themes of identity and belonging in the American Southwest.
projects.detailedDescription: Following three generations of a family across the desert landscape of Arizona and New Mexico, 'Desert Roads' weaves together stories of migration, adaptation, and the search for home. From a 1940s railroad worker to a modern-day game developer, each character navigates the vast spaces between tradition and innovation.
projects.excerpt: The highway stretched endless and patient, a ribbon of possibility cutting through time as much as landscape. Miguel pulled over at the same rest stop his grandfather had used forty years ago, when the world was different but the desert remained the same.
projects.researchNotes: Extensive research into Southwestern railroad history and contemporary tech culture
projects.inspiration: Based on family stories and the changing landscape of the digital Southwest

projects.title: Flash Fiction Collection
projects.shortDescription: Short stories and micro-fiction pieces. Quick reads that pack emotional punch in minimal words.
projects.detailedDescription: A curated collection of flash fiction pieces, each under 300 words, exploring themes of technology, nature, and human connection in the digital age. These micro-narratives capture complete emotional arcs in minimal space, perfect for modern attention spans.
projects.excerpt: Four stories of the digital desert: where neon signs buzz against sagebrush, where server farms hum in the silence, where old highways meet new technologies.
projects.specialFeature: Interactive web reading experience with navigation and typography designed for digital consumption

projects.title: Interactive Game Narratives
projects.shortDescription: Narrative design and writing for various game projects, blending storytelling with interactive media.
projects.detailedDescription: A collection of narrative work for interactive media, including dialogue trees, environmental storytelling, and character development for various game projects. This work explores how traditional storytelling adapts to player agency and choice-driven narratives.
projects.collaborativeNote: Often created in partnership with Juleah Miller for visual design integration

projects.title: Future Projects
projects.shortDescription: Upcoming books and story concepts on the creative horizon.
projects.detailedDescription: A collection of ideas and concepts in various stages of development, from initial sparks to detailed outlines. These represent the future direction of Alek's writing, exploring new genres and collaborative possibilities.
